title: Rust in 100 Seconds
description: Quick introduction to Rust by Fireship. Perfect for beginners wanting to understand what makes Rust special.

title: The Rust Programming Language Book
description: The official Rust documentation. Comprehensive guide covering all Rust concepts from basics to advanced topics.

title: Rust Crash Course
description: Complete Rust programming tutorial by Harkirat Singh. Learn Rust fundamentals in a structured way.

title: Rust Full Course - Build a CLI Project
description: Build a command line application in Rust. Hands-on project-based learning with practical examples.

title: Rust for Beginners
description: Step-by-step guide for beginners. Learn memory management, ownership model, and other core Rust concepts.

title: Rust Programming Masterclass
description: Advanced topics in Rust programming. Learn about concurrency, unsafe Rust, and systems programming fundamentals.
